connector.description: Consume Changes from MongoDB Collection in streaming mode.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.hosts
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: Comma separated list of MongoDB Host Addresses in host:port format.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.collection
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: Sets the name of the MongoDB collection to bind to this endpoint.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.username
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: Username for accessing MongoDB. The username must be present in the MongoDB's authentication database (authenticationDatabase). By default, the MongoDB authenticationDatabase is 'admin'.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.ssl
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: whether to enable ssl connection to mongodb

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.sslValidationEnabled
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: IMPORTANT this should be disabled only in test environment since can pose security issues.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.database
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: Sets the name of the MongoDB database to target.

camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.name: camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-source.streamFilter
camel.kamelet.mongodb-changes-stream-sou.description: Filter condition for change streams consumer. Example: { '$match':{'$or':[{'fullDocument.stringValue': 'specificValue'}]} }
